593	        offset = (page - 1) * per_page
594	        query = f"""
595	            SELECT 
596	                id, hostname, computer_name, ip_address,
597	                CASE 
598	                    WHEN device_status = 'Online' OR ping_response_ms > 0 THEN 'online'
599	                    WHEN device_status = 'Offline' OR (device_status = '' AND ping_response_ms IS NULL) THEN 'offline'
600	                    WHEN device_status = '' THEN 'unknown'
601	                    ELSE LOWER(COALESCE(device_status, 'unknown'))
602	                END as device_status,
603	                COALESCE(device_type, 'Unknown') as device_type,
604	                
605	                -- Hardware info
606	                processor_name, processor_cores, processor_logical_cores,
607	                total_physical_memory_gb, available_memory_gb,
608	                graphics_cards, connected_monitors,
609	                storage_summary, total_storage_gb,
610	                
611	                -- System info  
612	                operating_system, os_version, os_build,
613	                system_manufacturer, system_model, bios_version,
614	                
615	                -- Network info
616	                mac_address, network_adapters, ip_address as primary_ip,
617	                
618	                -- Software info
619	                installed_software, antivirus_software, firewall_status,
620	                
621	                -- User info
622	                current_user, user_profiles, last_logged_users,
623	                
624	                -- Management info
625	                COALESCE(assigned_department, 'Unassigned') as assigned_department,
626	                collection_method, data_completeness_score,
627	                hostname_mismatch_status,
628	                
629	                -- Performance info
630	                cpu_usage_percent, memory_usage_percent,
631	                COALESCE(system_uptime_hours, 0) as uptime_hours,
632	                
633	                -- Timestamps
634	                last_seen, created_at, updated_at,
635	                
636	                -- Additional fields for manual entry
637	                location, site, cost_center, purchase_date, warranty_expiry,
638	                department, -- legacy field
639	                serial_number, asset_tag
640	                
641	            FROM assets_enhanced 
642	            {where_clause}
643	            ORDER BY 
644	                CASE 
645	                    WHEN device_status = 'Online' OR ping_response_ms > 0 THEN 1
646	                    WHEN device_status = 'Offline' OR (device_status = '' AND ping_response_ms IS NULL) THEN 2
647	                    ELSE 3
648	                END,
649	                assigned_department, device_type, hostname
650	            LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
651	        """

1304	                                 (operating_system IS NULL OR operating_system = '') AND

110	                   CASE WHEN hostname != computer_name THEN 'MISMATCH' ELSE 'MATCH' END as status,

112	            FROM assets

354	                capture_output=True, 
355	                timeout=8,  # Longer timeout for reliability
356	                text=True,
357	                creationflags=subprocess.CREATE_NO_WINDOW if system == 'windows' else 0
358	            )

Test ID: B107

Confidence: MEDIUM
CWE: CWE-259
File: .\gui\enhanced_app.py
Line number: 543
More info: https://bandit.readthedocs.io/en/1.8.6/plugins/b107_hardcoded_password_default.html
542	
543	    def add_windows_cred(self, username="", password=""):
544	        from PyQt6.QtWidgets import QInputDialog
545	        
546	        if not username:
547	            username, ok = QInputDialog.getText(self, "Windows Username", "Enter username (e.g., domain\\user):")
548	            if not ok or not username.strip():
549	                return
550	        
551	        if not password:
552	            password, ok = QInputDialog.getText(self, "Windows Password", f"Enter password for {username}:", QLineEdit.EchoMode.Password)
553	            if not ok:
554	                return
555	        
556	        # Store credentials
557	        self.windows_creds.append({"username": username.strip(), "password": password})
558	        self._update_windows_creds_display()
559

607	
608	    def add_linux_cred(self, username="", password=""):
609	        from PyQt6.QtWidgets import QInputDialog
610	        
611	        if not username:
612	            username, ok = QInputDialog.getText(self, "Linux/SSH Username", "Enter username:")
613	            if not ok or not username.strip():
614	                return
615	        
616	        if not password:
617	            password, ok = QInputDialog.getText(self, "Linux/SSH Password", f"Enter password for {username}:", QLineEdit.EchoMode.Password)
618	            if not ok:
619	                return
620	        
621	        # Store credentials
622	        self.linux_creds.append({"username": username.strip(), "password": password})
623	        self._update_linux_creds_display()

99	            sys.executable, '-c', 
100	            '''
101	import sys
102	sys.path.append(".")
103	try:
104	    from launch_original_desktop import check_system_requirements
105	    print(" Launcher loads without auto-starting services")
106	except Exception as e:
107	    print(f" Launcher error: {e}")
108	            '''
109	        ], capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=10)
